body: Stanford professor and renowned political scientist Francis Fukuyama has written two books about the history of the modern state. His first, The Origins of Political Order: From Prehuman Times to the French Revolution, was critically acclaimed and leads to his second.

The just released Political Order and Political Decay: From the Industrial Revolution to the Globalization of Democracy looks at many nations, but, as reviewers have noted, has some positive things to say about the American system.
